title: MGM Drive-In Theater - IT! The Terror From Beyond Space (01 - 03
description:
MGM Drive-In Theater - IT! The Terror From Beyond Space (01 - 03) (2010) (c2c) (YZ1)



Issue #1

MGM Drive-In Theater  launches with the first of three special series updating classic sci-fi flicks! Here, It, the Terror From Beyond Space  is retooled as a retro-1950s alien adventure. Returning from a rescue mission to Mars, the spaceship Challenge 142 carries the only survivor of the first expedition who is now suspected of killing his crew for their lifesaving rations. Until something starts moving in the cargo bayÃ¢â‚¬Â¦    

Issue #2

Re-tooled as a retro-1950s alien adventure, we join the spaceship Challenge 142 returning from a rescue mission to Mars. It carries the only survivor of an earlier failed expedition who is suspected of killing his crew for their lifesaving rations. Now, as they travel EarthboundÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ they may be wrong about their prisoner, as something monstrous may have come on board the shipÃ¢â‚¬Â¦    

Issue #3

This retro-1950s saga follows the harrowing tale of the spaceship Challenge 142 as it carries the only survivor of an earlier failed expedition who is suspected of killing his crew for their lifesaving rations.  Traveling EarthboundÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ they discover a hungry man-eating creature that is killing the crew one member at a timeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
